discourse_list.title: Regarding a Reference ERC / EIP for Recursive and Hierarchical NFT System

content.content: Dear All, I am working on an NFT system that requires replication of the original NFT attributes and regeneration of NFT metadata in a sequential, contextual, coherent and recursive manner. Can somebody recommend the token specification from EIPs that I can refer for the NFT property replication.
content.GPT-summary: The author is seeking feedback on a specific aspect of their NFT system proposal and is asking for recommendations on which token specification from EIPs to refer to for NFT property replication. The post does not contain any advertising or collaboration requests, nor does it provide any information for a third party to give feedback on the proposal as a whole.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
